data.text: @MorobadiK @SizweLo Why would anyone trust some of the smartest people in the world when you can trust some mouth breathing plug living in their parents basement

@ChezGuarana @SizweLo PeEr ReViEwEd... 🙄🤦🏼‍♀️
@Moruri27 @SizweLo @mithisa_motho 😂
@SizweLo I'll say it again!! Sputnik v ...

@SizweLo @Nelson4eva2 I separate you from darkness in Jesus Christ name. I speak light. Let there be light.

Genesis 1:4.. God saw that the light was good. Then he separated the light from the darkness.

John 1:5.. the light shines in the darkness & darkness did not comprehend it. 

Follow me, will🔙
@SizweLo @mithisa_motho They got tired of monkeying around and are going straight for sheeple.....funny enough with sheeple's  consent.
@jaymarij OK. What does "leaving you alone" entail? Because I'm willing to do it

@SizweLo 🤦🏽‍♂️🤦🏽‍♂️🤦🏽‍♂️ it’s sad that most of what you tweet is conjecture - nothing based on fact. So again, you aren’t forced to have the vaccine, you non-vaxxers can stay in your corners and leave us alone. Surely can’t be that hard...
@8mmSA @SizweLo Good and decent Twitter convo you guys are having. Enlightening as well. Big ups!

@SizweLo @mzilanontobeko Unless you test things yourself, EVERYTHING we hear (pro or anti anything) is how "they" (who re trying to convince you, sell it.
Yes, I trust the science presented to me.
I work in ICT and at some point 5G was blamed for C19.
I did not trust that, others did and burnt towers.

@SizweLo @8mmSA The word RNA for me is what i should research about.

"Ribonucleic acid (RNA) is a polymeric molecule essential in various biological roles in coding, decoding, regulation and expression of genes."

Found thus definition.

I wonder how would my RNA be affected my mRNA vaccine.
@8mmSA @mzilanontobeko I'm assuming this is how they're selling it? The people who make it. And you trust these people?

@8mmSA @SizweLo Is the magnet stuff sticky?? 😂

Because that's a concern for me as having heavy mental on your body is another story. That's why they have a metal procedure to remove them from one's body is nowadays.

@SizweLo @mzilanontobeko In other words. too late for mama...?🤣

Anywho, keep checking up on me. If I doe, then you can use me as a case study 🥲

@SizweLo @mzilanontobeko My understanding is that the mRNA makes the protein to your body uses to fight the virus, then your body destroys the mRNA as it does with most foreign objects.

Here is a simple explanation https://t.co/LVMTMfEm9j
@8mmSA @mzilanontobeko Please watch the whole clip in the link I left at the bottom of that thread. Though it's kinda pointless for you at this point

@SizweLo @mzilanontobeko He admits that if the virus is TOO deadly, it does not move on (kills the host too quickly and cant spread)
So if the vaccine is making it MORE deadly, (in my body) how does it now, all of a sudden, become a problem when we have already established that MORE deadly = no spread?

@8mmSA @mzilanontobeko My understanding is that the 'vaccine' destroys your body's innate immune system, which then only leaves you with Covid antibodies. Suddenly your immune system can only fight some variants of Covid and nothing else
@mzilanontobeko @8mmSA I'd advise everyone to watch this before making a decision on this. Particularly the full video at the bottom of the thread https://t.co/GZnS4fsTVs

@8mmSA @SizweLo End of the day, i get why you're scared. I also get why they made people feel scared.

Then we also have things like vaccine passport that will kind of force all of us to vaccinated because the vaccinated "Safe" individuals still feel unsafe around unvaccinated
@8mmSA @SizweLo I would be happy with a 90% pass mark. I'll take those odd over possibly a deadlier choice that may or may not work

@mzilanontobeko @SizweLo Many medicines and medical procedures have side effects that may cause death. As for blood clots, they even occur (25 times worse) with the menstrual pill vs the vaccine (So far)
You still can contract C-19, but the aim is to make the impact less sever, once you have antibodies.

@8mmSA @SizweLo But you can still get covid and some people have died due to vaccine and others had blood clot. So, it's confusing to me if it can cause death when the whole point of the vaccine is to avoid death. That's what i also don't understand. Why contract Covid19 after being vaccinated?

@SizweLo Well, not the virus per se, but the related complications are deadly to some.
Just like influenza complications kills 600k globally
Or 
how you can live with HIV but AIDS related complications can kill you.

@mzilanontobeko @SizweLo Good questions I agree with. There must be no tricks, or lockdowns etc.  Fortunately, the vaccine is not mandatory.
You will maybe get antibodies the natural way but some like me have a useless immune systems so I cant risk that, even though I believe the virus is overblown.
@8mmSA Why do you believe this 'virus' is deadly?

@SizweLo The "why", is easy to answer once you pick a side.

You trust the process and vaccinate against a deadly virus. (mRNA is nothing complicated)
OR
You DON'T trust the process and you don't take it. (It's not mandatory)

It's the "I don't know what to believe" crowd I feel sorry for

@SizweLo @8mmSA Absolutely. Why the rush and why the tricks. Malaria has killed more people than Covid19 but here we are locked down by covid.

Many things aren't adding up for me. Over 90% recovery rate then why these extreme measures?
@8mmSA Personally, I don't think apart from few isolated incidents, people will start dying in numbers, if at all. I'm just stuck at "why?"

@SizweLo ... etc, when hit with just the normal influenza virus, I worry what a covid infection would do to me. So I rolled the dice. If I die, I'm soley responsible for the consequences as no one forced me to vaccinate. But I hope lessons are learnt for everyone else's  sake🙏

@SizweLo 5G signals are stronger around me and I can't walk past fridge magnets without them sticking to my arm 🤣

On the real though, I must admit, it is scary to be part of such an experiment. As someone who experiences severe Covid-19 like  symptoms (no taste, body aches, high fever..
@8mmSA How are the long-term effects treating you?😅😅
@SizweLo I took one Pfizer yesterday. Second dose in 7 weeks or so.
@SizweLo Which begs the question, "what could really be in those vaccines?" That they so desperately feel the need to pump up the numbers of people who are vaccinated.
@SizweLo So so dangerous to see people takimg the poison
@I_am_Tshenolo None of the above, in my opinion. They just want to inject humans by hook or by crook
@SizweLo Is it that they're pressed for time and that they need results quickly or that they already know that the injections will have little to no effect on humans?
